content: materials - 8 skeins of purl soho s campo 1 50% wool and 50% organically grown cotton each skein is 120 yards/ 100 grams approximately 960 total yards required - us 9 5 5 mm 24- or 32-inch circular needles 2 we used the colors below for our samples but check out 2 other palette ideas here 3 - tea rose - color a autumn hellebore color b fresco red color c rosa rose color d heirloom white - cabana - color a corsica yellow color b white sage color c eucalyptus green color d grotto blue gauge 14 stitches and 28 row = 4 inches in garter stitch size finished dimensions approximately 35 x 35 inches originally designed for purl soho by kristina mcgowan 4 knit up in this yarn and these colors by rickie painter 1 https //www purlsoho com/campo html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796 3 https //www purlsoho com/create/2021/08/11/four-points-blanket-in-campo/ 4 https //www frogandcast com/
